plot: St. Vincent de Paul struggles to bring about peace and harmony among the peasant and the nobles in the midst of the Black Death in Europe, carrying on his charitable work in the face of all obstacles.   Written by  Wheeler Winston Dixon
title: Monsieur Vincent
plot_es: St. Vincent de Paul struggles to bring about peace and harmony among the peasant and the nobles in the midst of the Black Death in Europe, carrying on his charitable work in the face of all obstacles.   Written by  Wheeler Winston Dixon
plot_en: St. Vincent de Paul struggles to bring about peace and harmony among the peasant and the nobles in the midst of the Black Death in Europe, carrying on his charitable work in the face of all obstacles.   Written by  Wheeler Winston Dixon

lists.title: Cine europeo de ayer y hoy
